c74object.name: ears.in
c74object.digest: Message input for a patch loaded by ears.process~
c74object.description: Use the ears.in object inside a patch loaded by ears.process~ to create an inlet receiving data from the parent patch.

metadatalist.metadata: Andrea Agostini, partly based upon work by Alexander J. Harker

objarg.name: inlets
objarg.description: The numbers of the message inlets of ears.process~ (conted from 1, starting from the leftmost) to be passed to ears.in. Default is 1.

attribute.name: direct
attribute.description:
When the direct attribute is set to 0 (as per the default), lllls received by ears.process~ are iterated in parallel with the buffer iteration. This means that the first element of each llll will be output by the corresponding ears.in immediately before the data from the first buffer received in each buffer inlet; the second element of each llll will be output immediately before the data from the second buffer; and so on.
When set to 1, each llll received by ears.process~ is immediately output from the corresponding ears.in.
